channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.description: 🔴 4:54 This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 04:53 Drive alarm to Poltava region. Watch for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 04:53 Drive alarm to Poltava region. Watch for further messages.#Poltava_Blast This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
